Name: Fractasia
About the game: Explore the worlds of Julius Horsthius through an incredible journey of sight and sound. Explore surreal caverns of fractally generated crystals, glide through alien megastructures and relax as mountains of rock glide slowly by, all set to the amazing music of some of the world's best digital composers. Fractasia consists of several 360Â° experiences including: - The Cryogenian - Machine VR - Crystal Habit - Foreign Nature Fractasia is compatible with the HTC Vive headset and controllers and the Oculus Rift
